document.discussion_title: Debut weekend for ‘train to the plane’ draws 80000 – FOX31 Denver – News Usy
document.topic_text: Debut weekend for ‘train to the plane’ draws 80000 – FOX31 Denver April 25, 2016 6:56 pm Views: Details on the “Train to the Plane” Service times and mapFares Stations and parking User Guide “It’s totally, absolutely perfect. I don’t come to this end of town much because I have to drive. And the parking is obnoxious,” Schwartz said. “I’m from Portland, originally, so taking the MAX Line out to the airport it’s only $4 or $5 I wanna say,” he said. Related
